Commands.Documentation: Adds X amount of gold to the player

Parameters.Name: amount
Parameters.Documentation: The amount of gold to add

Commands.Documentation: Adds an item with the provided name to the player's inventory, with an optional quantity.

Parameters.Name: item_name
Parameters.Documentation: Name of the item to add (NOT id!)

Parameters.Name: quantity
Parameters.Documentation: The quantity of the item to add, default of 1.

Commands.Documentation: Fade in the screen back to normal

Parameters.Name: duration
Parameters.Documentation: Length of time for fade-in duration, default of 24 frames

Commands.Signature: fade_out duration red green blue grey alpha
Commands.Documentation: Fade out the screen (to black, or optionally to a color)

Parameters.Name: duration
Parameters.Documentation: Length of time for fade-out duration, default of 24 frames

Parameters.Name: red
Parameters.Documentation: Red value of the color to fade to, default of 0 (0-255 range)

Parameters.Name: green
Parameters.Documentation: Green value of the color to fade to, default of 0 (0-255 range)

Parameters.Name: blue
Parameters.Documentation: Blue value of the color to fade to, default of 0 (0-255 range)

Parameters.Name: grey
Parameters.Documentation: Greyness, default of 0 (0-100 range), 100 is fully black & white.

Parameters.Name: alpha
Parameters.Documentation: Alpha value of the color to fade to, default of 1 (0-1 range, 0.5 is half transparent)

Commands.Signature: flash_screen duration red green blue intensity
Commands.Documentation: Flash the screen (to white, or optionally to a color)

Parameters.Name: duration
Parameters.Documentation: Length of time for fade-out duration, default of 24 frames

Parameters.Name: red
Parameters.Documentation: Red value of the color to fade to, default of 0 (0-255 range)

Parameters.Name: green
Parameters.Documentation: Green value of the color to fade to, default of 0 (0-255 range)

Parameters.Name: blue
Parameters.Documentation: Blue value of the color to fade to, default of 0 (0-255 range)

Parameters.Name: intensity
Parameters.Documentation: How intense should the flash be?  Default of 255, which is maximum intensity.

Commands.Documentation: Hides the entity with the given name.  If no entity provided, hides the calling entity

Parameters.Name: entity_name
Parameters.Documentation: Name of the event to hide.  NOT the ID!

Parameters.Name: direction_name
Parameters.Documentation: The direction to move the event in.  (up, down, left, right)

Parameters.Name: distance
Parameters.Documentation: The number of tiles to move the event

Parameters.Name: speed
Parameters.Documentation: The speed to move the event at.  Default of 0.25

Parameters.Name: event_name
Parameters.Documentation: The Name of the event to move (not ID!).  If not provided, defaults to the calling event

Parameters.Name: music_name
Parameters.Documentation: Name of the music file to play

Parameters.Name: volume
Parameters.Documentation: Volume to play it at, defaults to full volume (100)

Parameters.Name: sound_name
Parameters.Documentation: Name of the sound file to play

Parameters.Name: volume
Parameters.Documentation: Volume to play it at, defaults to full volume (100)

Commands.Documentation: Remove X amount of gold to the player

Parameters.Name: amount
Parameters.Documentation: The amount of gold to remove

Commands.Documentation: Adds an item with the provided name to the player's inventory, with an optional quantity.

Parameters.Name: item_name
Parameters.Documentation: Name of the item to add (NOT id!)

Parameters.Name: quantity
Parameters.Documentation: The quantity of the item to add, default of 1.

Commands.Documentation: Sets the background of the message window; options are 0 (fully opaque), 1 (transparent), 2 (invisible background). The default is 0.

Parameters.Name: opacity
Parameters.Documentation: The opacity of the background, 0, 1, or 2.

Commands.Documentation: Changes the direction the provided event name is facing.  If no event name is provided, defaults to the calling event.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Documentation: The direction to face (up, down, left, right)

Parameters.Name: event_name
Parameters.Documentation: The name of the event to face (not ID!).  If not provided, defaults to the calling event

Commands.Signature: set_level map_name x y direction fade_type
Commands.Documentation: Teleports the player to the specified map name, at a specific x and y.

Parameters.Name: map_name
Parameters.Documentation: Name (NOT id!) of the map to teleport the player to.

Parameters.Name: x
Parameters.Documentation: The x coordinate to teleport the player to.

Parameters.Name: y
Parameters.Documentation: The y coordinate to teleport the player to.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Documentation: The direction the player should face after teleporting, defaults to current player direction (up, down, left, right)

Parameters.Name: fade_type
Parameters.Documentation: The type of fade to use when teleporting, defaults to no_fade. (fade_black, fade_white, no_fade)

Commands.Documentation: Shows the event (if it's hidden).  If no event name provided, defaults to calling event.

Parameters.Name: event_name
Parameters.Documentation: The name of the event to show (not ID!).  If not provided, defaults to the calling event

Parameters.Name: opacity
Parameters.Documentation: The opacity to show the event at.  Defaults to 1 (fully visible)

Parameters.Name: duration
Parameters.Documentation: Fadeout time, defaults to 0 (no fadeout)

Commands.Documentation: Move an event (Same as move_event, except blocks script execution until movement is complete)

Parameters.Name: direction_name
Parameters.Documentation: The direction to move the event in.  (up, down, left, right)

Parameters.Name: distance
Parameters.Documentation: The number of tiles to move the event

Parameters.Name: speed
Parameters.Documentation: The speed to move the event at.  Default of 0.25

Parameters.Name: event_name
Parameters.Documentation: The Name of the event to move (not ID!).  If not provided, defaults to the calling event

Commands.Documentation: Teleports an event to the specified x and y.  If no event name specified, defaults to the calling event.

Parameters.Name: x
Parameters.Documentation: The x coordinate to teleport the event to.

Parameters.Name: y
Parameters.Documentation: The y coordinate to teleport the event to.

Parameters.Name: event_name
Parameters.Documentation: Name (NOT id!) of the event to teleport.  Defaults to calling event.

Commands.Documentation: Waits for a given amount of time.

Parameters.Name: duration
Parameters.Documentation: The amount of time to wait in frames

Functions.Documentation: Returns true if the player has the specified item.

Parameters.Name: itemName
Parameters.Documentation: The name of the item to check for (NOT ID!)

Functions.Documentation: Returns the number of the given item the player has.

Parameters.Name: itemName
Parameters.Documentation: The name of the item to check for (NOT ID!)

Functions.Documentation: Given a min and max, return a random number between them.

Parameters.Name: min
Parameters.Documentation: The minimum number to return.

Parameters.Name: max
Parameters.Documentation: The maximum number to return.
